articles.title: Chairman of International Military Sports Council Leaves
articles.content:
Chairman of International Military Sports Council Leaves
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Abdulhakeem Mohamed Isa Alshanoo, chairman of the International Military Sports Council, and his companion left here on Monday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the mission of the United Nations Children's Fund here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					 They laid a floral basket before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Relay Group of Young Vanguard Passes through South Phyongan Province
articles.content:
Relay Group of Young Vanguard Passes through South Phyongan Province
Phyongsong, December 14 (KCNA) -- Loyal members of the relay group of young vanguard arrived at Anju City, South Phyongan Province on Dec, 6.
					 They were greeted by Pak Thae Song, chief secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kang Hyong Bong, chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, officials concerned, people from all walks of life and school youth and children.
					
					 Members of the relay group of young vanguard of the province took over the red flag in Unhak-ri, Anju City. They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Phyongsong City, the statue of Kim Il Sung at the Paeksong Revolutionary Site and portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and mosaics depicting their beaming images in different units and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 They held a meeting with young front-rankers in noble traits in Anju City.
					
					 They visited the Madusan Revolutionary Battle Site and were briefed on the trees bearing revolutionary slogans which reflect the unshakable faith and will, indomitable fighting spirit of the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners.
					
					 They took part in the oath-taking meeting of youth and students in South Phyongan Province.
					
					 After looking round the Paeksong and Samhwa revolutionary sites and Kumchon Revolutionary Site, they held an oratorical meeting together with youth and students in Sunchon City.
					
					 They toured the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex, the February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine and other units.
					
					 They arrived in Yangdok County amid the welcome of working people and school youth and children.
					
					 They went round the Hyangphung Revolutionary Site and others and held a bonfire gathering.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed by Women's Union
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed by Women's Union
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea held a meeting at the Central Youth Hall on Monday on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the union, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 She and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il's whole life was the most brilliant one of the peerless patriot who dedicated his all to the country and its people.
					
					 They stressed that the sacred history of the sun and glorious and victorious one of the Juche revolution and Songun revolution is given steady continuity on the land of the DPRK as Marshal Kim Jong Un, another illustrious great man, is standing at the helm of the revolution, adding that Kim Jong Il will always be alive as the noble image of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 They noted that the union would dynamically conduct activities of shock brigade for giving assistance to the major worksites for building an economic power and wage various do-good-movements with the resolution to greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea as a heyday of the Korean revolution.

articles.title: Major Production Process of Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex Updated
articles.content:
Major Production Process of Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex Updated
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The major production process of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex was updated. 
					 Workers, technicians and officials of the complex and scientists and researchers of the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Chongjin University of Mining and Metallurgy and University of Sciences successfully put the huge hot rolling process on a CNC basis of Korean style and completed several projects. 
					
					 The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a congratulatory message to the workers, scientists, technicians and officials who performed shining feats in modernizing the major production process of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex. 
					
					 There took place meetings for conveying the message at the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, the automation institute and control machine institute under the State Academy of Sciences and Kim Chaek University of Technology respectively. 
					
					 The WPK Central Committee in the message highly praised workers and officials of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, scientists and technicians of the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Chaek University of Technology and other units for successfully updating the major production process as a proud gift to the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK and fully demonstrating the might of Juche-oriented science and technology.

articles.title: Tele-education on Steady Upgrade
articles.content:
Tele-education on Steady Upgrade
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Tele-education is gaining momentum in the DPRK with real-time updating of its contents and increased subscribers.
					 As part of the efforts to make all the people well versed in science and technology and develop the country into a talented nation, many achievements have been made in this field.
					
					 Tele-education College under Kim Il Sung University developed tele-education program proper for the international standard, thus making it possible to realize international exchange.
					
					 Kim Chaek University of Technology established a tele-education system based on mobile communication network and updated the contents of education.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik University of Education provides in-service training for teachers via tele-education system after upgrading teaching plans of different subjects.
					
					 An increasing number of learners have subscribed to the tele-education system established at different universities across the country.
					
					 More than 1,500 units subscribed to the tele-education system run by Kim Chaek University.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 11 Published
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 11 Published
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out Vol. 11 of the "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works", an encyclopedia of the Juche idea and the Songun idea which comprehensively deals with his works in a chronological order. 
					 The book contains 111 works leader Kim Jong Il published between May and December of Juche 57 (1968). 
					
					 The book comprehensively deals with the ideas and leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il who led the Korean revolution along the road of victory by further strengthening the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and developing in depth the revolutionary tradition of Mt. Paektu to be the most glorious one. 
					
					 It clarifies the issue of dynamically conducting the work of establishing the party's monolithic ideological system with a clear-cut goal as intended by the party, the theoretical and practical issue in intensifying the education in the revolutionary tradition and indicates tasks and ways for bringing about a fresh revolutionary surge in economic construction with indigenous efforts and technology.
					
					 It also indicates orientation and ways for improving the overall work of the country as required by the developing reality including the issue of successfully conducting the land administration to face-lift its appearance and provide the people with a happy life, the issue of properly preserving and managing historical and cultural sites and relics and the need for the officials to set example in work and life.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Properly Approach Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Properly Approach Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Dependence on foreign forces and cooperation with them are treacherous anti-reunification acts as they aggravate distrust and antagonism among the fellow countrymen and leave the inter-Korean relations to the tender mercy of those forces. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Cooperating with foreign forces is little short of selling off the destiny of the nation, while reducing the inter-Korean relations to their plaything.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities persist in the confrontation with compatriots in the north, cooperating with the U.S., taken in by the U.S. strategy of sacrificing the interests of the Korean nation to meet its aggressive purpose, it will only do harm to the Korean nation and the inter-Korean ties.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities are getting ever more frantic with cooperation with outside forces keen to stifle the DPRK in utter disregard of the nation's destiny and future of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Confrontation and conflict are unavoidable if one side opposes and hurts by force the ideology and social system of the other side under the situation where differing ideologies and social systems have long existed in the north and the south. Precisely for this reason the DPRK has consistently called for reunification by federal formula.
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities are foolishly seeking the confrontation of social systems, seized with the daydream of "changes in the north" and "its collapse." 
					
					 The ceaseless anti-DPRK provocations being made by them in cooperation with the outside forces behind the scene of dialogue only make the prospect of inter-Korean dialogue gloomy.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to have a proper approach towards the inter-Korean relations, the article urges, adding:  Their dependence on outside forces and confrontation of the social systems would never help settle any problem concerning the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Authorities' Trial Aimed to Stifle Chongryon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Authorities' Trial Aimed to Stifle Chongryon
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The Kyoto District Court held a trial recently on the charge of "illegal import of Songi mushroom to Japan from north Korea".
					 It imposed jail terms and fine on a guiltless official of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, a compatriot and a company on false charges made by the prosecution.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This fascist action was a clear revelation of the harsh hostile policy toward the DPRK, Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, a policy which has long been an incurable disease of Japan's politics. 
					
					 This is proved by the fact that Japan's court authorities declared them guilty contrary to its constitution and criminal procedure code in breach of the principle of independence and impartiality of judicature.
					
					 This trial was staged, prompted by an extreme evil intention and political prejudice without any legal evidence. Therefore, it goes to clearly prove that the Japanese reactionaries are making desperate efforts to attain their sinister objective of their campaign against the DPRK and Chongryon while trampling down justice in utter disregard of law.
					
					 It is their deep-rooted sinister intention to create atmosphere of terror and pressure by stirring up extreme hatred, phobia and bad blood towards Chongryon and Koreans in the Japanese society in a bid to trample down the right of Koreans in Japan to live and stamp out Chongryon.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' despicable mud-slinging and crackdown upon Chongryon and Koreans in Japan are an unpardonable infringement upon the dignity of the DPRK and vicious politically-motivated provocation against it.
					
					 It is, at the same time, a flagrant violation of human rights, humanitarianism and international law. 
					
					 The DPRK will never remain an onlooker to the Japanese reactionaries' ever more desperate provocation against the DPRK and Chongryon but strongly react against it, the commentary warns.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Excusing Themselves for Failure of Their State Administration
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Excusing Themselves for Failure of Their State Administration
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Kyunghyang Daily News carried an editorial on Dec. 11 accusing the authorities of excusing themselves for the failure of their state administration in disregard of the public mindset.
					 The editorial recalled that the "government" had the New York Times carried a story about its reform.
					
					 This was the story refuting the criticism of the south Korean government's "state-compiled" history textbook and labor reform, etc. which was made by the newspaper last month, it noted, and continued:
					
					 It was shameful that the government's retrogressive policy became a target of criticism from foreign media but the government is insisting on its unilateral assertion while ignoring the people's will.
					
					 The story is no more than a lame excuse for the "government's" failure of the state administration while belittling the people.

articles.title: South Korean Public Organization Accuses Regime of Arresting KCTU Chairman
articles.content:
South Korean Public Organization Accuses Regime of Arresting KCTU Chairman
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy on Dec. 11 issued a statement lambasting the police's fascist suppression of the chairman of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The arrest of KCTU Chairman Han Sang Gyun provided an occasion of revealing once again the fascist cruelty of the present "regime".
					
					 The authorities arrested the chairman on charges that he spearheaded the rally demanding the probe into the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster and the workers' struggle in April and May and the all-out people's action in November, the statement noted, adding: All the actions were just resistance against the tyranny of the present "regime" and its suppression of vital rights. He is not a criminal.
					
					 Struggle is the only way for protecting the life of the people and democracy, the statement declared, calling on the people of various circles to turn out in the struggle to check the retrogressive revision of the labor law and force the present "regime" to step down by successfully staging the general strike and another all-out people's action on Dec. 19.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed by Koreans in China
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held a meeting in Shenyang, China on Dec. 11 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Su Bong, vice-chairman of the association, and officials of the association and its affiliated units and Koreans in China and the DPRK consul general in Shenyang.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Choe said in his speech that Kim Jong Il was the outstanding thinker and theoretician and peerless elder statesman who always led the revolution and construction to victory with his profound ideas and theories and through his extraordinary leadership, endowed with the noblest personality and quality as a great man, adding:
					
					 He consolidated the party, state and army to be President Kim Il Sung's party, state and army and put the national dignity and power on the highest level.
					
					 The history of his revolutionary activities, his revolutionary exploits, his august name and benevolent image will always be remembered by the service personnel and people of the country and overseas Koreans.
					
					 A message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 The participants watched a Korean film dealing with Kim Jong Il's revolutionary exploits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Organization of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Organization of DR Congo
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The DR Congo committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il published a bulletin on Dec. 7 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of his demise.
					 The bulletin carried articles under the caption "The idea and exploits of leader Kim Jong Il will be immortal" and subtitles "Leader Kim Jong Il", "Defender of socialism" and "Feats performed for the cause of national reunification."
					
					 The articles said that Kim Jong Il dedicated all his life to the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche and energetically worked for the development of socialist Korea, its people's happiness, national reunification and human emancipation. Though he passed away, he is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and world progressives as the sun, they noted.
					
					 They referred to the fact that he defended socialism under the uplifted banner of Songun, ushered in the new era of building a thriving nation and wisely led the cause of independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Bulgarian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Bulgarian Body
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" was carried by the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association in the December issue of its bulletin.
					 The work, made public on Nov. 1, Juche 83 (1994), clarifies the idea that Korean-style socialism based on the socialist theory of Juche is the most scientific and viable one. It also clearly explains the principled issues arising in defending socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Foreign Personages
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on Dec. 4 and 7 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. They included a reading session in Kyrgyzstan, a lecture in Bangladesh and a seminar in Malaysia.
					 The chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party said that Kim Jong Il further consolidated the single-minded unity of the leader and popular masses in the whole period of leading the country and its people and developed the DPRK into the politico-ideological power and bolstered up the Korean People's Army as an invincible army.
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy noted that Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea, Songun idea and remarkably bolstered up the national power by pursuing unique Songun politics and thus laid a solid foundation for the rosy future of socialist Korea.
					
					 He, at the same time, firmly protected the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK from the imperialists' moves to stifle it, performing immortal exploits guaranteeing the triumphant advance of the global cause of independence, the chairman stressed.
					
					 The managing director of a Malaysian company noted that Kim Jong Il provided the historic north-south summits, opening a rosy prospect for Korea's reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Tanzania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Tanzania
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Tanzania on Dec. 5.
					 Maina, secretary general of the Tanzania-DPRK Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Meetings for remembering leader Kim Jong Il were held in Indonesia, Nigeria and Angola on December 2 and 3.
					 The manager of the Milenia Armada Express Company of Indonesia said in his speech that Kim Jong Il performed undying feats for the era and history by dint of outstanding idea and rare leadership, true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Speakers including chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy said that Kim Jong Il unrolled the great plan for building a thriving socialist nation, laid a solid foundation for it through his devoted leadership and turned the DPRK into one of not many satellite manufacturers and launchers in the world.
					
					 They expressed belief that the undying feats performed by Kim Jong Il all his life would shine long as the noblest legacy for accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 The director of the special project room of the Presidency of Angola praised Kim Jong Il as a great paragon of the popular leader, adding that he rendered positive support to the African people in their struggle for independence and the building of new society.

articles.title: Jefe de delegacion de APS subraya posicion de RPDC en asamblea parlamentaria Asiatica
articles.content:
Jefe de delegacion de APS subraya posicion de RPDC en asamblea parlamentaria Asiatica
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El vicepresidente de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, An Tong Chun, quien preside la delegacion, pronuncio el dia 9 un discurso en la sesion plenaria de la VIII Asamblea Parlamentaria Asiatica.
					Debido a la arbitrariedad y el choque de relaciones de interes de las potencias de acuerdo con el creciente valor estrategico de la region de Asia-Pacifico, se torna mas complicado el ambiente de seguridad de la region asiatica, inicio el orador y prosiguio:
					
					Es muy importante la posicion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana en asegurar la paz y estabilidad de Asia.
					
					La RPDC aspira la paz y desea el ambiente pacifico segun el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad.
					
					A fin de garantizar el desarrollo sostenible de la economia y mejorar de manera cualitativa la vida del pueblo, la RPDC considera como la condicion mas importante el ambiente pacifico en vez de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Desde la concertacion del Acuerdo de Armisticio hasta la fecha, la RPDC presento las propuestas e iniciativas reales y justas para sustituirla por el convenio de paz, y brindo incesantes y sinceros esfuerzos por ello.
					
					Pero, Estados Unidos, autor y administrador del Acuerdo de Armisticio y empleador del mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra de las tropas surcoreanas, y sus satelites dan espalda todavia a esta propuesta justa de la RPDC.
					
					Es invariable la postura de la RPDC de poner fin de manera pacifica al estado de tension de la Peninsula Coreana mediante el dialogo y negocios y de contribuir a la paz y estabilidad de la region del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					Convencidos de que la sustitucion del Acuerdo de Armisticio por el convenio de paz y la reunificacion de la patria por sistema federal devienen el camino para contribuir a la paz y estabilidad de Asia, haremos todos nuestros esfuerzos sinceros por alcanzarlo.

articles.title: Celebrada III Conferencia Nacional de Funcionarios Financieros y Bancarios
articles.content:
Celebrada III Conferencia Nacional de Funcionarios Financieros y Bancarios
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 13 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la III Conferencia Nacional de Funcionarios Financieros y Bancarios.
					El conclave hizo balance de los exitos y experiencias alcanzados en el pasado en las labores financieras y bancarias y discutio las tareas y remedios para asegurar confiablemente en lo financiero la causa de la construccion de un Estado  prospero.
					
					Alli participaron Pak Pong Ju, Pak Yong Sik, O Su Yong, Ro Tu Chol, los vicepremieres Ri Mu Yong y Ri Chol Man, el ministro de Finanzas Ki Kwang Ho, el presidente del Banco Central Kim Chon Gyun, el presidente del Banco de Comercio Exterior Kim Song Ui, los funcionarios de los comites, ministerios y organos centrales, los funcionarios de las  provincias, ciudades y distritos, los ejemplares funcionarios financieros y bancarios de todo el pais y los benemeritos.
					
					Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dio lectura al mensaje del Mariscal Kim Jong Un enviado a los participantes en la III Conferencia "Registremos cambios en las labores financieras y bancarias para acelerar la construccion de un Estado prospero".
					
					La misiva recuerda que en la RPDC las labores financieras y bancarias se fortalecieron y se desarrollaron sin cesar asegurando en lo financiero la construccion socialista y la vida material y cultural del pueblo bajo la atencion y la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Tras presentar una original idea financiera y bancaria aplicando los principios de la Idea Juche, el Presidente establecio un ventajoso sistema de administracion financiera y bancaria a estilo coreano que posibilita resolver todos los problemas pendientes en las labores financieras y bancarias de acuerdo con la demanda independiente y el interes de las masas populares trabajadoras, subraya.
					
					Destaca que el Dirigente desarrollo y enriquecio las autoctonas ideas y teorias financieras y bancarias, preparando asi la guia directiva para mejorar y fortalecer estas labores, establecio el sistema de la direccion del partido sobre la rama financiera y bancaria y tomo las medidas revolucionarias para consolidar y desarrollar el regimen financiero y bancario.
					
					Enfatiza que mejorar y fortalecer las labores financieras y bancarias es la demanda indispensable para acelerar la construccion de un Estado prospero y agrego que debe ser preparado la propia fuente financiera confiable a fin de levantar el paraiso del pueblo donde sea fuerte el poderio estatal y todos prosperen.
					
					Asegurar fidedignamente en lo financiero la direccion del partido sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun y la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista fortaleciendo mas firmemente la base financiera del pais y consolidando la circulacion monetaria, constituye la tarea general asumida ante el sector financiero y bancario, menciona.
					
					Insiste en que al tener bien presente la gran confianza y la esperanza del partido, los funcionarios de la rama financiera y bancaria deben cumplir satisfactoriamente el sagrado deber asumido ante la patria y el pueblo para registrar un nuevo viraje en las labores financieras y bancarias.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Ro Tu Chol, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, vicepremier y presidente del Comite Estatal de Planificacion.
					
					El informante senalo que el Mariscal hizo celebrar la presente conferencia y envio mensaje para indicar el rumbo y el remedio para mejorar y fortalecer las labores financieras y bancarias.
					
					Dijo que todos los exitos logrados en las labores de la rama son el fruto de los incansables esfuerzos de los grandes Lideres y de la destacada direccion del Mariscal.
					
					Exhorto a establecer mas estrictamente el sistema de la direccion unica del Mariscal y realizar las labores financieras y bancarias segun las lineas y politicas del partido.
					
					En la Conferencia hubo intervenciones.

articles.title: RPDC mejora calidad de educacion a larga distancia
articles.content:
RPDC mejora calidad de educacion a larga distancia
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Esta mejorando incesantemente la calidad de educacion a larga distancia en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que aspira a la formacion a todos los ciudadanos como excelentes cientificos y tecnicos y potencia de talentos.
					El Instituto Superior de Educacion a Larga Distancia adscrito a la Universidad Kim Il Sung desarrollo conforme a la norma internacional el eficiente sistema de educacion a larga distancia combinando organicamente la administracion de asuntos docentes, el profesor, el alumno y el administrador, de manera que preparo la perspectiva de realizar el intercambio en el ambito internacional.
					
					La Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek establecio el sistema de educacion a larga distancia segun la red de comunicacion movil y completo la redaccion de nuevos planes de leccion.
					
					La Universidad Pedagogica Kim Hyong Jik completo los planes de leccion de decenas de asignaturas inclusive la ciencia de leccion y la logica, de manera que realiza a larga distancia la reeducacion de los profesores de la universidad pedagogica y la universidad normal de todo el pais. Y redacto de nuevo los planes de leccion a larga distancia y programas de experimento de ensayo y renueva sin cesar los sistemas de apoyo a la educacion a larga distancia.
					
					Cada dia mas se aumentan los numeros de los estudiantes que aprenden a traves del sistema de la educacion a larga distancia establecido en las importantes universidades del pais entre otras la Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang, la Universidad de Industria Ligera Han Tok Su de Pyongyang, la Universidad de Industria Quimica de Hamhung, la Universidad de Industria Hullera de Phyongsong, la Universidad de Agricultura de Wonsan y la Universidad de Mineria y Metalurgia de Chongjin.
					
					Salieron en el ultimo octubre los graduados del Instituto Superior de Educacion a Larga Distancia adscrito a la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek y llega a mas mil 500 el numero de las unidades que reciben la educacion de dicha Universidad.
